email_chain.subject: Freight Quote: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Dear Liam,

I hope this email finds you well.

Following our discussion, I am pleased to provide you with a firm offer for the shipment of steel coils from Rotterdam to Houston:

Commodity: Steel Coils
Quantity: 12,000 MT
Load Port: Rotterdam
Discharge Port: Houston
Incoterms: CFR
Vessel: Suitable geared vessel
Freight: USD 75/MT
Laycan: 15-20 November 2023

This offer is valid for 48 hours. Please let me know your thoughts.

Best regards,
Julia Martinez
Ocean Cargo Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Hi Julia,

Thank you for the prompt response.

USD 75/MT seems a bit high compared to current market rates. Could you consider lowering the rate to USD 70/MT? Also, could you provide details on the vessel's DWT and LOA, as well as the demurrage rate?

Best regards,
Liam O'Connor
Steelworks Ltd.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Dear Liam,

Thank you for your feedback. I can adjust the rate to USD 72/MT. The vessel we are considering is MV OCEAN BREEZE, with a DWT of 45,000 and LOA of 180m. The demurrage rate is USD 10,000 per day, pro rata.

Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Julia

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Julia,

USD 72/MT is still a bit higher than we were hoping for. If you can extend the laycan to 18-23 November, could you offer a rate of USD 70/MT?

Best regards,
Liam

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Liam,

I can agree to USD 70/MT with the revised laycan of 18-23 November. Please confirm your acceptance so we can proceed with the recap.

Best regards,
Julia

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Julia,

USD 70/MT works for us. Please send over the recap.

Best regards,
Liam

email_chain.subject: Confirmed: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Liam,

Great! Please find the recap attached.

Commodity: Steel Coils
Quantity: 12,000 MT
Load Port: Rotterdam
Discharge Port: Houston
Incoterms: CFR
Vessel: MV OCEAN BREEZE
Freight: USD 70/MT
Laycan: 18-23 November 2023
Demurrage: USD 10,000/day pro rata.

Thank you for your business!

Best regards,
Julia Martinez
Ocean Cargo Brokers
